data.description: Nginx performance can be improved when pinning Nginx worker processes to individual CPUs
data.tags: container_support nginx performance sbr_webservers tuning webservers
data.summary: Pinning worker processes to individual CPUs can improve the Nginx performance, e.g. higher achievable throughput and lower traffic on UPI interconnection. The best practice is to run one nginx worker process per CPU core.
data.generic: Pinning worker processes to individual CPUs can improve the Nginx performance, e.g. higher achievable throughput and lower traffic on UPI interconnection. The best practice is to run one nginx worker process per CPU core.
